2025-11-28HCCannabis ActRegulations Amending the Cannabis Regulations (Harmonization with Certain Provisions of the Controlled Substances Regulations) Regulations Amending the Cannabis Regulations (Harmonization with Certain Provisions of the Controlled Substances Regulations) in order to ensure that various provisions remain aligned with the Controlled Substances Regulations.Registration: SOR/2025-0244 Publication Date: 2025-12-17
subject: Regulations Amending the Cannabis Regulations (Harmonization with Certain Provisions of the Controlled Substances Regulations)
precis: Regulations Amending the Cannabis Regulations (Harmonization with Certain Provisions of the Controlled Substances Regulations) in order to ensure that various provisions remain aligned with the Controlled Substances Regulations.
